#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Bag.

= Description =

A Golf Bag is a element that allow a [[Player]] to keep track of the clubs used during a round of golf.


= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # id - Unique identifer.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # name
 # note

== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # club-ref - A reference to a [[Club Golf Club]].
